Detailed Description

DzShape subclass for polygonal mesh geometry.

Member Function Documentation

DzFacetShape * DzFacetShape::createShapeFromGroup ( const QString &  groupName  )  const [virtual, slot]
Parameters:
groupName Name of the face group in the curFacet mesh to create the new shape from
Returns:
A pointer to the a new shape created from the given group in the shape's curFacet mesh or null if no such group exists. The caller takes ownership of the new shape and should delete it when done.
DzFacetMesh * DzFacetShape::getFacetMesh (  )  const [slot]
Returns:
A pointer to the curFacet mesh geometry held by this shape.
DzGeometry * DzFacetShape::getGeometry (  )  const [virtual, slot]
Returns:
A pointer to the geometry this shape references.

void DzFacetShape::setFacetMesh ( DzFacetMesh *  geom  )  [virtual, slot]

Sets the Facet mesh geometry that is held by this shape. DzFacetShape takes ownership of this geometry - any previous geometry object held by the shape is deleted.

void DzFacetShape::startLoad ( const DzInFile *  file  )  [virtual]

Note: Save of .daz is deprecated in favor of duf/dsf. Developers are encouraged to support backwards compatibility, but new functionality need not support .daz.

Called by the framework just before section loading for this object begins. Derived classes can override this method to perform preparatory operations to reading their file data.

Parameters:
file The file being read.

Reimplemented from DzBase.
